articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: Europe's new Ariane 6 rocket launching for 1st time ever this week - Space.com
articles.description: Liftoff is scheduled for Tuesday (July 9) at 2 p.m. ET.
articles.content:
Europe's new heavy-lift Ariane 6 rocket is set to make its long-delayed debut on Tuesday (July 9).
If all goes according to plan, the Ariane 6 will launch from Europe's Spaceport in Kourou, French G… [+2166 chars]

articles.title: Le Pen's National Rally to take control of far-right Patriots in EU Parliament - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The new group, which also includes Viktor Orbán’s MEPs, is set to become the third-biggest force in Parliament.
